edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.nasa

Class HDFRasterLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.visualization.Canvas
      • edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.nasa.HDFRasterLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class HDFRasterLayer
extends Canvas
    A frequency map that can be used to draw a weighted heat map for NASA data
    Author:
    Ahmed Eldawy
